p: Total phenolic content in the extract was determined by the modified Folin–Ciocalteu method [ 31]. The reaction mixture consisted of 200 µL of extract, 200 µL of 2N Folin–Ciocalteu reagent, and 400 µL of 20% sodium carbonate solution. The mixture was stirred and incubated in a water bath at 40°C for 20 minutes. The experiment was carried out in triplicate. The absorbance was read at 760 nm. Total phenolic content was expressed as milligram gallic acid equivalent/gram extract (mgGAE/gE) using the equation obtained from a calibration curve of gallic acid ( y = 1877.9 x + 0.1142; R 2 = 0.9989).
